name: databricksDeployScripts
description: Deploys a folder of Notebooks to your Databricks workspace-TEST
author: Data Thirst Ltd

inputs.name: bearerToken
inputs.label: Databricks bearer token
inputs.helpMarkDown: API Key - see your user account in your Databricks Workspace

inputs.name: region
inputs.label: Azure Region
inputs.helpMarkDown: The location of your workspace as seen in workspace URL

inputs.name: localPath
inputs.label: Source files path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Root path of the fiiles to deploy (will include subfolders)

inputs.name: databricksPath
inputs.label: Target files path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Root folder to deploy to - must start /
